page.title: 17Leisure Activities continued
page.content: around the village. The recently improved Village Hall is the venue for Ballroom Dancing, Whist Drives and the Gardening Club during weekday evenings. The Forget-me -Not Club meets one afternoon a week. A playgroup meets there most mornings and the W.I. meets there every month as does the Parish Council. The School is used as well for Keep Fit. There is also a Football Club and Cricket Club on the Meadow View Playing Field. The Public Houses have darts teams and the Cock Inn has got a 'Pool' Team as well. This year will see the start of the Sports Hall to be built on Meadow View Playing Field by the Sports and Social Club. There are already Changing Rooms and showers built.
